channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MicroCopy

item.title: CVE-2021-24397|2024-08-03T19:28:23.912Z -- unknown -- microcopy
item.description: The edit functionality in the MicroCopy WordPress plugin through 1.1.0 makes a get request to fetch the related option. The id parameter used is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
